/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. Dominating the center of the frame is a large, white building with a curved roof, its stark color contrasting with the clear blue sky above. The building is nestled amidst lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. A few people can be seen walking on the sidewalk in front of the building, going about their day. In the background, power lines crisscross the sky, a common sight in many cities. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
